remarks: Ordered pair membership in a class abstraction of pairs.  Compare to ~ elopab .  (Contributed by Alan Sare, 8-Feb-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 6-May-2015.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
opelopab4 $p |- ( <. u , v >. e. { <. x , y >. | ph } <-> E. x E. y ( ( x = u /\ y = v ) /\ ph ) ) $.
$d u x $.
$d u y $.
$d v x $.
$d v y $.
